publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1234# Dr Elaine Murray: Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train-That the Parliament congratulates the Food Train on the expansion of its operations delivering groceries to elderly and disabled people throughout Dumfries and Galloway; further congratulates the Food Train on the introduction of its services in Dalkeith, Midlothian, and looks forward to similar services being established throughout Scotland.

S2M-1234# Dr Elaine Murray: Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train-That the Parliament congratulates the Food Train on the expansion of its operations delivering groceries to elderly and disabled people throughout Dumfries and Galloway; further congratulates the Food Train on the introduction of its services in Dalkeith, Midlothian, and looks forward to similar services being established throughout Scotland.

S2M-1234# Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train (lodged on 29 April 2004) Bill Butler*, Elaine Smith*, David Mundell*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-1234# Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train (lodged on 29 April 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Robin Harper*, Maureen Macmillan*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-1234# Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train (lodged on 29 April 2004) Trish Godman*, John Swinburne*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1234# Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train (lodged on 29 April 2004) Shiona Baird*
S2M-1234# Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train (lodged on 29 April 2004) Rhona Brankin*
S2M-1234# Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train (lodged on 29 April 2004) Frances Curran*
S2M-1234# Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train (lodged on 29 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
S2M-1234# Expansion of Services Provided by the Food Train (lodged on 29 April 2004) Cathy Peattie*
